Uses of Interface
Hexxagon.AI.IOperator

  • Packages that use IOperator 
    Package Description
    Hexxagon.AI
    Classes and interfaces found in this package are designed to implement functionalities of artificial intelligence.
    Hexxagon.Controller
    Classes and interfaces found in this package are designed to implement the controller layer of Hexxagon module.

    • Uses of IOperator in Hexxagon.AI

      Classes in Hexxagon.AI that implement IOperator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FissionOperator
      Contains method of fission step applied on board state.
      (package private) class  ImpossibleOperator
      Contains method of an operator which is never apliciable of any board state.
      class  JumpOperator
      Contains method of jump step applied on board state.
      (package private) class  Operator
      Contains shared methods of different type of operators.
